name: Annihilate
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Everything that fits in a 10 foot cube centered on target point within range that you can see must succeed on a Willpower saving throw. On a failure, it loses five hit dice. On a success, it takes 8d6 damage, which cannot be reduced or prevented.

Objects that are not held by a creature as well as creatures without enough hit dice that fail their saving throw are utterly annihilated as their core components are procedurally scattered across the plane.
empower: Deals an additional 3d6 damage on both a successful save and a failed save.
